2633  // and that's fine (and we'll create it implicitly with append)

2643  }

2651  1);
2652  }
2653  }

2657  {

2659  {
2660  states[i] = states[count - 1];
2661  XChangeProperty(_glfw.x11.display, window->x11.handle,
2662  _glfw.x11.NET_WM_STATE, XA_ATOM, 32,
2663  PropModeReplace, (unsigned char*) states, count - 1);
2664  break;
2665  }
2666  }

2671  }
